event.title: was platted, under the name of Allin, on December 14, 1867

data.event: The beginnings of Stanford Stanford was platted, under the name of Allin, on December 14, 1867.

event.title: was founded, within a few months

data.event: The McLean County town of Covell was founded, within a few months of Allen, as a station on the same railroad.

event.title: 1870 the name of the town was changed

data.event: In 1870 the name of the town was changed to Stanford.

event.title: was incorporated as a village in June 1874

data.event: It was incorporated as a village in June 1874.
He was first a farmer and then ran a grocery in Stanford, where he continued to live until his death in 1912.

event.title: many years after the town was founded

data.event: For many years after the town was founded John Armstrong ran a grocery in Stanford.
By 1895 these included a hotel, a bank, the Masonic Hall, and several stores.
